Package pieces

Class Rook

java.lang.Object
pieces.Piece
pieces.Rook
public class Rook extends Piece
Represents a Rook piece in the game of chess.

  • Constructor Details

    • Rook

      public Rook(String color, Position position)
      Constructs a Rook with a specified color and starting position.
      Parameters:
      color - The color of the piece ("white" or "black").
      position - The starting position of the piece on the board.

  • Method Details

    • isValidMove

      public boolean isValidMove(Position to, Piece[][] board)
      Validates if a move to a new position is legal for a Rook. A Rook moves horizontally or vertically through any number of unoccupied squares.
      Specified by:
      isValidMove in class Piece
      Parameters:
      to - The destination position for the move.
      board - The current state of the game board.
      Returns:
      true if the move is valid, false otherwise.

    • getSymbol

      public String getSymbol()
      Gets the text symbol representing the Rook.
      Overrides:
      getSymbol in class Piece
      Returns:
      "wR" for a white Rook, "bR" for a black Rook.
